DOC.brief_summary: This randomized field trial uses a self-report daily exercise log to answer the research question: Does frequency of instruction influence tai chi/qigong home practice exercise persistence among residents of Senior housing?
DOC.brief_title: Tai Chi/Qigong Exercise Persistence Among Residents of Senior Housing
DOC.criteria: Resident of Senior housing, Ability to engage in mild exercise Vision sufficient to view TV medium Willingness to engage in tai chi/qigong training and practice. Unable to provide informed consent Unable to attend initial training session
